website_summaries.verdict: An affordable hot dog and bun toaster with a retro look in two great colors.
pros: This toaster features five heat settings and can toast two hot dogs and two buns at once
Includes a crumb tray for easy cleaning
The compact design works well for small kitchens
cons: A few customers reported that buns can easily become burnt
Some hot dog buns may not fit

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for Xmas, and my dad loves it. He comes in the house after working, pops a couple hot dogs and buns in the toaster, and heads back to the shop. Toasts the buns nicely and the dogs aren’t warm on the outside, cold inside; they are completely cooked and he loves it. Great gift, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: No more exploding hot dogs
customer_reviews.text: My kids won't eat a hot dog that was cooked for too long in the microwave and exploded so this has saved me hundred's of dollars! And yes, Karen, I feed my kids hot dogs...they are delicious! Both my 7 and 12 yr olds can operate it easily and love making their hot dogs themselves. We have used it several times and the hot dog and buns come out perfectly and there really isn't any clean up involved. May after a few more uses we will get some crumb buildup from the buns but that will be a cinch to clean up which is just another reason this thing is so awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Cross

customer_reviews.title: My Fave Kitchen Appliance
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this. Its a running joke with our little family that we don't cook a lot but we sure do have a lot of unique kitchen appliances. Hot dogs are one thing that we do "cook" frequently. I also love toasting our buns. When I seen this, I knew we had to have it. This is so easy to use, place buns and hot dogs in, press button like you would a regular toasters; adjust dial setting depending on your preference. Hot dog basket pops out too which makes it easy to clean. Even comes with a cute pair of baby tongs to help you get them out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Carico

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product doesn't toast hot dog buns with frankfurters
customer_reviews.text: I expected to use this as a shortcut to making frankfurters with toasted buns. Cheaply made gizmo. The hot dogs took two tries to cook properly, during which the buns barely got warm and fell apart in the toaster side. Better off sticking the frankfurters in a vegetable steamer -- better tasting, too! The bun toaster side a total zero. Could I get my money back if I return the unit, even though I discarded the original packing?
customer_reviews.author: Richard Milner

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color.... Very easy to used delicious hotdogs in minutes, great for a quick and easy meal. Hotdog tasted better than boiled ones.
customer_reviews.author: Koss

customer_reviews.title: Very fun as well as useful for quick and delicious cooking!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen my child enjoying some hot dogs in the past like most children. As she is getting older I also noticed that she frequently started to make herself toasts. I thought that this hot dog toaster would make a perfect combination gift for her liking. I was very right and she adores making hotdogs with this Pop-Up Hot Dog and Bun Toaster. It is extremely easy to make a perfect warm hot dog and it works fabulously. Also, the fun design was a huge positive and we all love the retro look. When my child is eating and enjoying it, I am happy. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: KBM

customer_reviews.title: It is very gift able
customer_reviews.text: Got to give as a gift and it worked way better Than I thought the hot dogs were done all the way through.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Low price, attractive appearance, works great.
customer_reviews.text: I just love hot dogs, so I decided that this toaster would help me. Now every morning I make hot dogs for myself and my whole family. In short, there are 5 toasting levels and a separate slot for 2 sausages and 2 buns. I do not regret that I bought this toaster. I use it every day. Great hot dog, toaster! I am glad of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this hot dog toaster for our camper so the kids can cook and roast hotdogs if we don’t have access to a campfire. It’s small and easy to store when we don’t have a lot of space. We got to use it this weekend and it’s probably the best thing we have ever bought for camping! It was easy to clean since there’s a nice “crumb catcher” in the bottom. The kids thought it was the coolest invention and it was easy for them to use. The only thing I would suggest is the tongs are pretty flimsy so just bring a better set of tongs to get them out
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice toaster to have
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful toast and color is nice. It looks likenot that easy to clean though
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: Quick easy meal
customer_reviews.text: My family has a second house on a small lake and we are always having people over for the weekend. Many times the kids dont want what we’re having and I bbq them hotdogs. This toaster makes my life so much easier now we can just toast two hotdogs at once. I recommend doing the bun once and the hotdogs twice if you want a tad crispy. Wife is happy it with the retro look and color that matches the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: It's so neat
customer_reviews.text: I'd never even heard of one of these until my 10 year old son sold me about it. It works amazingly, it's easy to clean, and is the size of a toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Khandi Kanes

customer_reviews.title: Must have for retro fans.
customer_reviews.text: This hot dog and bun toaster by Elite by America is stunning. Recently purchased as a gift for my aunt who grew up in the 70’s, I couldn’t give it away. The color and design of this toaster was enough for me to just keep as a show piece. Perfect for anyone looking for that little pop of color in their kitchen. I’ve used it about 4 times now on those lazy days I just don’t want to cook and it works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: That the dog doesnt get stuck again ..other wise I will have to get another one maybe .
customer_reviews.text: I only had it since sept 13th itvwork fine until I drop the hot dog got stuck and the little hold side fell out put them back in and when I used it again it got stuck had to use a knife to pull it out.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Balbach. Prefect to keep spices in

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, cheap, cheap
customer_reviews.text: This resembled a Japanese toy made back in the 50's. Very cheaply put together. Once you got the buns in you played hell trying to get them out. just all around not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: RudeDog

customer_reviews.title: Hot dog cooker
customer_reviews.text: The sides for the buns could be a little bigger, I had to stuff them in. Also instructions say not for jumbo hot dogs but can be used for bratwurst-not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Cool Gift Idea!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so when my friend told me about this little toaster, I didn’t believe him. He said there’s a toaster out there that will cook your hotdog and warm up the buns. This is such a cool gadget and would be a great gift for a Christmas gift exchange or a white elephant party. It does a great job. I just wish it did more at a time.
customer_reviews.author: FFNando

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Not too good for the buns, but for the price, it's a nifty little item. Dogs have to be toasted twice for any 'burn' marks.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C.

customer_reviews.title: Vintage look
customer_reviews.text: I always been a fan of vintage look. This is great looking and it functional too. Color is exact as image shown.
customer_reviews.author: chat

customer_reviews.title: Returning because doesn't heat hot dogs n doesn't toast buns.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time exactly as described. I started return because the hot dogs don't heat and buns don't toast. The buns also got stuck.
customer_reviews.author: BlackDove2

customer_reviews.title: Good for everything but the buns!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this overall. However the bad part of this is the fact that the buns do NOT fit in it whatsoever. I tried several times. But it just burned to the side and ruined the buns. It does cook the hotdogs pretty great. I am happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: XXK

customer_reviews.title: I threw away not useful
customer_reviews.text: On full heat the dog is half cold. It toasted the bun good.
customer_reviews.author: Roland H. Born

customer_reviews.title: Buns Sticks
customer_reviews.text: Buns stuck to sides not happy but will cook my hot dogs
customer_reviews.author: Robert Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great way to make a hot dog fast!
customer_reviews.text: Made out of plastic cheap quality. Toasted the bun and hot dog was perfect
customer_reviews.author: JennJenn

customer_reviews.title: Works great easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Love the product the kids don't have to bother me anymore .
customer_reviews.author: Elamenoepee

customer_reviews.title: burnt buns and half cooked dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as I enjoy hotdogs as my guilty food but no one else in my house eats them. The buns don't fit, get stuck and burn. The hot dogs are unevenly cooked. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aungelecette

customer_reviews.title: HARD TO CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: Hard to clean. Bread burns quickly, takes forever to make a hotdog-just put it in the microwave instead.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Ray

customer_reviews.title: Easy for my children (10/12) to use
customer_reviews.text: This is easy & safe enough for my 10 & 12 year old to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my preteens
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this though they dont use the toasting part for the roll. But I am very satisfied overall with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Flores

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best gift for the Christmas season. Works and looks great! Love it
customer_reviews.author: terry carter

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget
customer_reviews.text: Nice hot dog toaster for the kids to use after school.
customer_reviews.author: milliean

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!  And so do I!
customer_reviews.text: First time I saw one of these, someone plugged one in when we were working a booth at the fair, it cooked the hot dogs quick and buns at the same. I was impressed that the hot dogs were cooked thoroughly and had a slight crisp to it. So I bought 3 for 3 nephews at Christmas time...from what I was told, they asked their parents to buy more hot dogs and was texting each other about their toasters. The boys are 10/11 years old. It's great for camping, slumber parties, and for their sporting events. Now, if only there was a burger toaster that's easy to clean and portable...
customer_reviews.author: ankles

customer_reviews.title: Not bad! It’s a keeper
customer_reviews.text: So I am pretty much the laziest person you have ever met. I live by myself and don’t like cooking just for me. This hot dog cooker gets the job done. Easy to use and I have cooked hotdogs and buns in less than 4 minutes. Glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Works great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter cause she begged me too plus she'll be home alone all summer so I figured it soupy come in handy. It's a very pretty color and it works great. Setting number 3 did make the edges of the bread a little burnt which my daughter did not like but setting number 2 was perfect. Warmed up the bread just enough and have it a slightly toasted feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C - Texas City

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: This makes fast, delicious hotdogs with a toasty bun. I cook the hoy dogs a little longer than the buns. I haven't figured out a great cleaning method for the inside yet. I hope grease accumulation won't be a problem in the long term. For what it does, it is great!
customer_reviews.author: maddykins

customer_reviews.title: Scaled to incorrect size
customer_reviews.text: While this may fit a standard size hot dog, a regular hot dog bun DOES NOT fit. Please note, this was not an extra large bun, it was the regular bun, and no go. I'm not sure that the manufacturer properly sized this for North American food. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Methven

customer_reviews.title: delish!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and the dogs are delicious too! My dad loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super !!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to make hot dog in a few minutes, my children are delighted with the new acquisition, at home we are super happy I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: Cooks hotdogs too much or too little. There doesn't seem to be an equal medium on cooking them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Hot Dog Maker
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and price! Cheaper than most red ones and works great! My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tama A. Marks

customer_reviews.title: No, it doesn’t pop up.
customer_reviews.text: Our son wanted this for Christmas. Well it cooks your hotdogs, and then burns them because it doesn’t pop up in its own!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Conley

customer_reviews.title: Prepare hot dogs the quick & easy way!
customer_reviews.text: Why did it take decades of eating hot dogs to come up with this? We use it all the time! My wife loves the convenience and easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: Just Doesn't Do The Job
customer_reviews.text: Buns don't fit well and hot dog is poorly done. Seller is good.
customer_reviews.author: Conservative Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy for the kids to use
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt toaste the hot dog very much,even on the highest setting,but my family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: melonie

product_meta.title: Elite by Americana ECT-542BL Retro Pop-Up Hot Dog and Bun Toaster Cooker Machine with Tongs, Heat Veggie Links Kosher Beef Turkey Sausages Bratwurst, 2 Slice
product_meta.description: Color:ECT-542BLThe Americana by Elite Hot Dog Toaster is a fast, fun and convenient way to enjoy hot dogs any time! This unique toaster holds up to two regular-sized hot dogs and two hot dog buns at once saving extra dishes and time. It features five adjustable heat settings, a hot dog basket and tongs for easy removal, an easy to clean crumb tray, and convenient power cord storage that allows you to neatly tuck and store the power cord out of sight underneath the toaster. The Elite Hot Dog Toaster is perfect for entertaining, as well as a quick meal solution for hot dog lovers of all ages!
feature_bullets: Toasts 2 hot dogs and 2 hot dog buns simultaneously from regular-size to extra plump
5 Adjustable heat settings with built in timer and cancel button to cook to desired doneness
Includes hot dog basket and mini tongs to safely and easily remove hot dogs when done cooking
Slide out crumb tray for fast & easy clean up
Hidden cord storage: the cord neatly tucks away and out of sight underneath the toaster
Hidden cord storage: the cord neatly tucks away and out of sight underneath the toaster
Included Components: 2 Slice Hot Dog Toaster

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars212 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
